powerwalk.model.interact

Class Transportable

  • java.lang.Object
    • powerwalk.model.GameObject
      • powerwalk.model.interact.Teleportable
        • powerwalk.model.interact.Transportable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComplexInteractable, Interactable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Canoe, CharterShip, EntranaBoat, FairyRing, GnomeGlider, HotAirBalloon, IcebergBoat, JatizsoBoat, LunarIsleShip, MagicCarpet, Minecart, MiscellaniaShip, MusaPointShip, NeitiznotBoat, PiratesCove, ShiloCart, SpiritTree, WaterbirthIsle

    public abstract class Transportable
extends Teleportable
    Represents a GameObject that allows a transport to another Transportable.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Transportable

        public Transportable(int x,
             int y,
             int z,
             int rawNumber,
             java.util.Collection<? extends Transportable> dests)
        Creates a new Transportable at the specified position and with the specified raw value.

        the destinations for this Transportable are defined in dests

        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the Teleportable
        y - the y-coordinate of the Teleportable
        z - the z-coordinate of the Teleportable
        rawNumber - the raw value for this object from the RSBot environment

    • Method Detail

      • follow

        public void follow(Transportable dest)
            throws OutOfReachException
        Teleports you to the designated Point.
        Parameters:
        dest - the Point of destination.
        Throws:
        OutOfReachException - when the requirements are not met or this Transportable cannot be used to travel to Transportable dest.

      • follow

        public void follow()
            throws OutOfReachException
        Teleports you to the first destination Point.

        When there are no destinations for this Transportable, this method does nothing.

        Specified by:
        follow in class Teleportable
        Throws:
        OutOfReachException - when the requirements are not met.
